title: In which site can I download songs with their cover art? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nowhere! At least nowhere legally and even though there are good websites to download songs for free, they usually don’t have the cover art! So what you need to do is download a song and slap the sucker on yourself. You can find a tutorial on youtube. The whole process lasts 5 secs with a program. You just select the song in program and drag the cover to the song. Can’t remember the name but I’m sure you’ll find it.

Use a music streaming service like Spotify or Deezer or if you don't want to pay monthly for music then download and pay for the music off of Either Google play or Itunes and if you meant how do you get it for free then either listen to it on youtube or use the free version of Spotify but don't try to download the album for free as it is illegal and could have viruses on the files your trying to obtain.
